title: Hokusai’s The Great Wave Now on Display at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
The Art Institute of Chicago has three copies of Katsushika Hokusaiâ€™s iconic work The Great Wave Off Kanagawa in its collection and one of them has been removed from storage and is back on display in the museum until Jan 6, 2025.

The Great Wave has not been on view in the Art Institute galleries for five years because, like all prints, it is susceptible to light damage and must rest a minimum of five years between showings to preserve its colors and vibrance.
